resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102874</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102874</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Two paths to knowledge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Pfade zum Wissen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux voies d'accès à la connaissance</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois trajetos ao conhecimento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due percorsi a conoscenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο μονοπάτια στη γνώση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos caminos al conocimiento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For students who  always finish their class work early or want more information than you have time to give, try curriculum compacting.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für Kursteilnehmer, die immer ihre Kategorie 
Arbeit früh beenden oder mehr Informationen wünschen, als Sie Zeit 
haben zu geben, das Lehrplanverbinden versuchen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour les étudiants qui terminent toujours leur 
travail de classe tôt ou veulent plus d'information que vous avez le 
temps pour donner, essayer le compactage de programme d'études.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para os estudantes que terminam sempre seu 
trabalho da classe cedo ou querem mais informação do que você tem o
tempo para dar, para tentar comprimir do curriculum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per gli allievi che rifiniscono sempre presto il 
loro lavoro del codice categoria o desiderano le più informazioni che
avete tempo di dare, provare comprimere di programma di studi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για τους σπουδαστές που τελειώνουν πάντα την εργασία 
κλάσης τους νωρίς ή θέλουν περισσότερες πληροφορίες από έχετε 
το χρόνο να δώσετε, δοκιμάστε τη συμπίεση προγράμματος σπουδών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para los estudiantes que acaban siempre su trabajo
de la clase temprano o desean más información que usted tiene tiempo
para dar, intentar la condensación del plan de estudios.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WAVERLY HARRELL
FN:WAVERLY HARRELL
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085930</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102874</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/two-paths-to-knowledge</uri>
